definition: unable to restrain one's anger (idiom); in a towering rage
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

sentences.english: City manager Joe Royle could barely contain his anger at the official's performance.
sentences.chinese: 曼城领队莱尔对球证表现感到怒不可遏。

sentences.english: Millions of money to anger, revenge Japanese mountain.
sentences.chinese: 钱百万怒不可遏，决意下山报复日军。

sentences.english: His tantrums are a statement of his need for attention.
sentences.chinese: 他的怒不可遏表明他需要引起注意。

sentences.english: He maddened at the thought of how he had been betrayed.
sentences.chinese: 他一想起自己被出卖的情形就怒不可遏。

sentences.english: Resentment flared at such an unmannered intrusion.
sentences.chinese: 对这种明目张胆的入侵感到怒不可遏。

sentences.english: Liu Bei retired calmly, but Zhang Fei was furious.
sentences.chinese: 刘备退休的很平静，但张飞怒不可遏。

sentences.english: Before his departure for the station, his father stopped speaking to him in anger.
sentences.chinese: 出发之前，李万胜的父亲怒不可遏试图阻止。

sentences.english: She went white; I was furious.
sentences.chinese: 她脸色煞白，我怒不可遏。

sentences.english: He bleated his objections in a helpless rage.
sentences.chinese: 他怒不可遏地颤声表示反对。

sentences.english: He lifted, and pushed the table away in anger.
sentences.chinese: 他怒不可遏地掀掉了桌子。

sentences.english: Later that day, she received an angry email from her former flame.
sentences.chinese: 当天她的昔日恋人就怒不可遏地发来了一封电邮。

sentences.english: All of it makes Greg Hoglund furious.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些令霍格伦德怒不可遏。
他变得怒不可遏，满脸涨红。

sentences.english: I am so very very angry, I am furious.
sentences.chinese: 我非常非常的生气，我怒不可遏。

sentences.english: He couldn't check his anger to see such cruelty to children.
sentences.chinese: 看到对待儿童如此残忍使他怒不可遏。

sentences.english: His rudeness made me boil with anger.
sentences.chinese: 他的无礼使我怒不可遏。

definition: stamp with fury/fly into a rage
lit. to slap the table and stand up (idiom); fig. at the end of one's tether/unable to take it any more
to fly into a rage out of humiliation/to be ashamed into anger (idiom)
lit. spouting smoke through the seven orifices (idiom)/fig. to seethe with anger
to fly into a rage/to rage violently
gnashing one's teeth (idiom); displaying extreme anger/fuming with rage between gritted teeth
to rain curses (on sb)/to let sb have it/to bawl sb out
